_header: And as I passed in my prayer there priests were at mass
Note: See 2094 for the companion piece, Mum and the Sothsegger.
Subjects: contemporary conditions; Richard II, deposition of; national policy, discussions of; alliterative unrhymed

CULLl414.First Lines:
And as I passid in my preiere þe prestis were at messein a
                    blessid borugh þat bristow is named…
CULLl414.Last Lines:
…To be seruyd sekirly of þe same siluerand some dradde
                    dukis and do well ffor soke
CULLl414.Note:
857 lines; ends imperfectly after only 11 lines on f. 119v;
                    then ff. 120-125 missing.
